Room.Name: Main Courtyard Northwest
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the northwest corner of the main courtyard.
Room.LongDescription: The interior wall of the castle is covered with a rambling grape vine which was growing here when the castle was built centuries ago. Some of the vines are as thick as a man's arm, providing a good handhold for anyone adventure- some enough to want to climb them. A small booth has been set up here, and a bright canopy flies above it. The vendor seems to be selling charms against evil spirits and ghosts. A small sign says he will also buy your charms and amulets.
